Class ncsa.hdf.object.H5Group 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----ncsa.hdf.object.HObject
            |
            +----ncsa.hdf.object.Group
                    |
                    +----ncsa.hdf.object.H5Group
public class H5Group
extends Group
Group is the superclass for HDF4/5 group, inheriting the HObject.

Group is an abstract class. Its implementing sub-classes are the H4Group and H5Group. This class includes general information of a group object such as members of a group and common operation on groups for both HDF4 and HDF5.

Members of a group may include other groups, datasets or links.

Version:
1.0 12/12/2001
Author:
Peter X. Cao, NCSA

H5Group(int, String, String, String, Group, long[])
 

close(int)
Ends access to a group specified by group_id and releases resources used by it.

public boolean writeMetadata(java.lang.Object info) throws HDF5Exception
          Creates a new attribute and attached to this dataset if attribute does not exist. Otherwise, just update the value of the attribute.

Parameters:
info - the atribute to attach
Returns:
true if successful and false otherwise.
